blogs.title: My First React Blog
blogs.body: Thanks for reading my first Blog Post. It may not be long and engaging, but I hope you liked it.
blogs.author: Mario

blogs.title: Welcome Party!
blogs.body: I am hosting a welcome party for a friend I have not seen in a long while, please do attend it.
blogs.author: Josh

blogs.title: Vacation in Paris!
blogs.body: Planning to go on vacation in Paris. Going with lots of friends and family. It should be a swell time.
blogs.author: Ken
